tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: A terrible excuse for a doctor, she gave us no diagnosis paper, but slapped a test on us right away. The doctor was in a hurry to see us out of her cabin, and the attendant was in a hurry to charge us a consultation fee. Did we understand what the doctor meant by her two minute prognosis on a cyst in the uterus of my daughter? NO. it is a doctor's job to explain precisely and clearly what the problem at hand might be, but this lady showed no such concern. We were more confused than ever about the problem in my daughter's uterus. ** **** **** **** ********** ****** **** ***** *********** *** *** ****** ***** ** *** ***** ** ****** ***** ****** *** ** ********* ** ******* ***** ******* *** **** ***** *** ** *****

Overall it was okay..only thing I didn't like was when I mentioned Dr. Suhasini that it was my second opinion from her and I have already done the test..her behaviour totally changed and she got little irate.. after that she didn't even listened to me properly where I was trying to say her about the medicine which I am taking.. also since I didn't get appointment that day but could manage somehow..so in front of me itself she told that not to entertain any patients without the appointment..which I personally didn't like.. she did some examine just to increase the bill which I felt was unnecessary.. I am not sure whether I should visit her again.. if some one coming for a second opinion they should treat them properly.. I would recommend peeple to visit her but also assure them they can get such behaviour..

review: *** ** *** **** ******** she has treated my Mother hence we know the doctor from years. There was no second thought on which gynaecologist to consult once I came to know that I was pregnant.

Dr was very understanding & empathetic. After suffering for 6yrs I now have a ray of hope that finally I will be treated for my pain. Fibroids are extremely painful & sometimes itâ€™s not treated properly. I thank Dr for addressing my condition.
Dr is **** **** * very well experienced. I would surely recommend this doctor to my friends and family members
